long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CleanSlate History Cleaner: Smart Browser History Management

CleanSlate helps you maintain a clean and organized browsing history by automatically managing entries based on your preferences. This lightweight Chrome extension combines privacy-focused features with simple, intuitive controls.

Features:
• Category-based Filtering: Organize and manage history entries using customizable categories
• Domain Whitelist: Preserve important sites by adding them to your whitelist
• Flexible Scheduling: Choose between manual cleaning or automated schedules
• Simple Interface: Easily configure settings through a clean, modern dashboard
• Local Processing: All operations are performed locally on your device

Ideal for:
• Users who value privacy
• Shared computers
• Anyone looking to keep their browsing history organized

CleanSlate runs quietly in the background, requiring minimal interaction while maintaining your browsing privacy. The extension needs history access permission to function, but all data processing remains local to your device.
